messages.title: Working for even better schools
messages.content: Keith Turner is pleased to report that more than 10,000 Liverpool children's schools will be radically transformed by the Council's £335 million investment in schools. Massive improvements to primary and secondary schools is also underway.

messages.title: A strong team for Old Swan
messages.content: Colin Eldridge and Keith Turner at Corinthian Community Primary School, are delighted that the Lib Dem Council is investing even more in our schools and in our children.

messages.title: Liverpool ONE
messages.content: New leisure centres. 21st century libraries. Canal link at Pier Head. £10 billion investment. Renewed confidence. Pride in our city.

messages.title: A record of action...
messages.content: Council Tax frozen. Most improved Council. Excellent Council services. 25,000 jobs created in Liverpool. GCSEs - best results ever. Best ever European Capital of Culture. Investing in Parks. Cruise liners back on the Mersey.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring a £335 million investment to radically transform Liverpool schools.
Continuing to fund crime fighting schemes on top of the Police budget.
Giving budgets and decision making to the residents.
Committed to keeping Council Tax down.
Furthering employment opportunities in Liverpool by 2020.

issues.education: Keith Turner is pleased to report that more than 10,000 Liverpool children's schools will be radically transformed by the Council's £335 million investment in schools.
